departureFlight.from: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, Mumbai

returnFlight.to: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, Mumbai

localTransport.details: Arrange for a pre-booked airport taxi via Goa Miles app. Consider renting scooters from a reputable vendor for local travel. Ensure valid license and helmet use.

days.weather: Hot and humid, High of 33°C, Low of 26°C. Sunny with a gentle breeze.

activities.title: Arrival and Check-in at Resort Rio
activities.description: Arrive at Dabolim Airport. Take a pre-booked taxi to Resort Rio in Arpora. Check in and freshen up.
activities.location: Dabolim Airport (GOI) to Resort Rio, Arpora

activities.title: Lunch at Souza Lobo
activities.description: Enjoy a traditional Goan lunch at Souza Lobo on Calangute Beach. Known for its seafood and lively atmosphere.

sustainableAlternative.title: Lunch at Vinayak Family Restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Opt for a smaller, locally-owned restaurant for a more authentic experience and support the local community.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Supports local businesses and reduces food miles.

activities.title: Relax by the Pool
activities.description: Spend the afternoon relaxing by the pool at Resort Rio.

activities.title: Dinner at Resort Rio
activities.description: Enjoy dinner at one of Resort Rio's restaurants.

days.weather: Hot and humid, High of 33°C, Low of 26°C. Clear skies with high UV index.

activities.title: Visit Fort Aguada
activities.description: Explore Fort Aguada, a well-preserved 17th-century Portuguese fort offering panoramic views of the Arabian Sea.

sustainableAlternative.title: Walk to Reis Magos Fort
sustainableAlternative.description: Instead of taking a taxi, opt for a scenic walk to Reis Magos Fort from Fort Aguada (if feasible).
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces carbon footprint and allows for a more immersive experience.

activities.title: Lunch at Fisherman's Wharf
activities.description: Enjoy lunch at Fisherman's Wharf, known for its Goan and seafood delicacies.

activities.title: Explore Panjim City
activities.description: Explore the charming streets of Panjim, visit the Immaculate Conception Church, and stroll along the Mandovi River.

activities.title: Dinner at Mum's Kitchen
activities.description: Savour authentic Goan cuisine at Mum's Kitchen, known for its traditional recipes.

days.weather: Hot and humid, High of 34°C, Low of 27°C. Mostly sunny with a chance of afternoon showers.

activities.title: Dudhsagar Falls Trip
activities.description: Take a day trip to Dudhsagar Falls, one of India's tallest waterfalls. Includes jeep safari and swimming in the natural pool.

sustainableAlternative.title: Visit Spice Plantation
sustainableAlternative.description: Explore a local spice plantation and learn about Goan spices and agriculture. Support local farmers and enjoy a natural experience.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Supports sustainable agriculture and reduces environmental impact compared to long-distance travel.

activities.title: Lunch at Spice Plantation (If alternative chosen)
activities.description: Enjoy a traditional Goan lunch at the spice plantation. (If Spice Plantation is visited)

activities.title: Dinner at The Black Sheep Bistro
activities.description: Enjoy a fusion dinner at The Black Sheep Bistro, known for its innovative dishes and cocktails.

days.weather: Hot and humid, High of 34°C, Low of 27°C. Sunny and dry with a strong sea breeze.

activities.title: Explore Anjuna Flea Market
activities.description: Visit the famous Anjuna Flea Market for souvenirs, handicrafts, and clothing.

sustainableAlternative.title: Shop at Local Artisan Shops
sustainableAlternative.description: Visit local artisan shops in Panjim or Mapusa for unique Goan handicrafts and support local businesses.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Supports local artisans and reduces waste associated with mass-produced goods.

activities.title: Lunch at Curlies
activities.description: Enjoy lunch at Curlies, a popular beach shack on Anjuna Beach.

activities.title: Relax at Anjuna Beach
activities.description: Spend the afternoon relaxing at Anjuna Beach.

activities.title: Dinner at Antares
activities.description: Enjoy dinner at Antares, known for its stunning sunset views and global cuisine.

days.weather: Hot and humid, High of 33°C, Low of 26°C. Clear and sunny conditions.

activities.title: Morning at Calangute Beach
activities.description: Take an early morning walk or swim at Calangute Beach, before the crowds arrive. Opt to engage in beach cleanup activities.

activities.title: Lunch at Infantaria
activities.description: Enjoy a final Goan lunch at Infantaria, a popular cafe and bakery in Calangute.

sustainableAlternative.title: Pack Your Lunch
sustainableAlternative.description: Instead of dining out, pack a picnic lunch from a local store using reusable containers and cutlery.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces waste and supports local businesses.

activities.title: Shopping for Souvenirs
activities.description: Do some last-minute souvenir shopping in Calangute or Panjim. Buy from local artisans.

activities.title: Transfer to Dabolim Airport
activities.description: Take a pre-booked taxi to Dabolim Airport for your flight back to Mumbai.
